text: "Easy on Me" is a song by English singer-songwriter Adele. It was released on 15 October 2021 as the lead single from her upcoming fourth studio album, 30. The album was made available for pre-order the same day. She wrote the song with its producer, Greg Kurstin. "Easy on Me" broke the record for most single-day streams on Spotify and also the most-requested song ever on Amazon Music in its first day using Alexa. It became her fifth number-one single in the US, the week after entering at number 68 on the Billboard Hot 100 based on only five hours of sales and streams. The song entered at number one in the UK, New Zealand, and Australia.
